full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice: Request for Proposal of ControlByWeb Equipment for Fisheries and Oceans Canada
#### Solicitation Number: WS4378234739
#### Posting Date: January 17, 2024
#### Deadline to submit responses: February 2, 2024, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of the Government of Canada invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide ControlByWeb equipment to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO). The contract is for the procurement of components for information technology or broadcasting or telecommunications.

**Contract Details**
* Contract category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of opportunity: None

**Contracting Entity and End User Entities**
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End user entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

**Contact Information**
* Jean-Robert Goulet, PSPC (SPAC/TPSGC)
* Email: jean-robert.goulet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Note**
All responses must be submitted electronically by February 2, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST, to be considered for this contract. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive. Only qualified suppliers who meet the requirements outlined in the tender opportunity will be invited to participate in the competitive bidding process. 

Please note the deadline to submit responses for this tender has expired. (added by my різніoutine) )))
